name: Case of the mysterious death of Keiko Haraeda
name_original: Case of the mysterious death of Keiko Haraeda
description:
Basically, I welcome streaming.
Monetization is also permitted, but we prohibit the distribution of videos that fall into the following examples.
・Videos that are offensive to public order and morals
Videos that aim to slander or destroy the value of the game.
・Videos that can only be viewed by paying members, such as Youtube membership.
・Videos that do not add value through live action, etc. (videos that do not include commentary, only game screens and audio, etc.)

I will not be liable for any damages whatsoever resulting from the streaming of videos of this game.

※This game contains fiction.
